name: EcoCart
fullDescription:
EcoCart revolutionizes plastic recycling by connecting collectors with recycling points. Earn eco-credits for your contributions to a cleaner planet.

Key Features:
• Smart Collection Routes - Optimize your recycling routes
• Real-time Recycling Points - Find nearby collection points
• Eco-credits Rewards - Earn points for your contributions
• Community Challenges - Join environmental initiatives
• Progress Tracking - Monitor your impact
• Environmental Stats - See your contribution to a cleaner planet

Join thousands of eco-conscious users making a difference, one collection at a time!
